**Function**

- [sum1( ...nums )](#sum1)

## Function

### <a id="sum1" href="#sum1">#</a> sum1( ...nums ) ⇒ `void`

Returns the sum of all numbers passed to the function.

##### Parameters

| Name    | Type            | Description                                 |
| ------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| ...nums | `Array<number>` | A sequence of positive or negative numbers. |

---
